name: Infinitely up 5
description:
Description

Infinitely up 5 - this is a physical puzzle, where your task is to build a tower. You are randomly given out figures and from them you build a bull, the difficulty is that the figures possess physics and if you drop at least one you lose. You will have to plan places for subsequent figures, because some figures are very versatile, while others may come in handy in very rare cases and will disturb you. Use your wits and think tactically. How high can you build a tower?

Features:

- Interesting and addictive gameplay

- A variety of shapes

- Minimalistic style

- Pleasant music
